fields.title: Paper Card Machine
fields.description: Twist the pencil, and one card will appear and the other disappear.
fields.instructions: [] Seal the empty envelope [] Line up a playing card with its short end along the envelopes short side[] Cut envelope about 2cm past the card [] Turn the envelope so the open end faces up. About ¾” below the open end, cut or tear small half circles on either side [] Decorate envelope [] Twist and wrap 3-4 rubber bands around the middle of your pencil [] Carefully push pencil through the holes [] Now, you can put a card on either side of the pencil in the envelope and twist the pencil to reveal each one
